Moves.Name: Pound
Moves.Description: Pounds the foe with forelegs or tail.

Moves.Name: Karate Chop
Moves.Description: A chopping attack with a high critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: DoubleSlap
Moves.Description: Repeatedly slaps the foe 2 to 5 times.

Moves.Name: Comet Punch
Moves.Description: Repeatedly punches the foe 2 to 5 times.

Moves.Name: Mega Punch
Moves.Description: A strong punch thrown with incredible power.

Moves.Name: Pay Day
Moves.Description: Throws coins at the foe. Money is recovered after.

Moves.Name: Fire Punch
Moves.Description: A fiery punch that may burn the foe.

Moves.Name: Ice Punch
Moves.Description: An icy punch that may freeze the foe.

Moves.Name: ThunderPunch
Moves.Description: An electrified punch that may paralyze the foe.

Moves.Name: Scratch
Moves.Description: Scratches the foe with sharp claws.

Moves.Name: Vice Grip
Moves.Description: Grips the foe with large and powerful pincers.

Moves.Name: Guillotine
Moves.Description: A powerful pincer attack that may cause fainting.

Moves.Name: Razor Wind
Moves.Description: A 2-turn move that strikes the foe on the 2nd turn.

Moves.Name: Swords Dance
Moves.Description: A fighting dance that sharply raises Attack.

Moves.Name: Cut
Moves.Description: Cuts the foe with sharp scythes, claws, etc.

Moves.Name: Gust
Moves.Description: Strikes the foe with a gust of wind whipped up by wings.

Moves.Name: Wing Attack
Moves.Description: Strikes the foe with wings spread wide.

Moves.Name: Whirlwind
Moves.Description: Blows away the foe with wind and ends the battle.

Moves.Name: Fly
Moves.Description: Flies up on the first turn, then strikes the next turn.

Moves.Name: Bind
Moves.Description: Binds and squeezes the foe for 2 to 5 turns.

Moves.Name: Slam
Moves.Description: Slams the foe with a long tail, vine, etc.

Moves.Name: Vine Whip
Moves.Description: Strikes the foe with slender, whiplike vines.

Moves.Name: Stomp
Moves.Description: Stomps the enemy with a big foot. May cause flinching.

Moves.Name: Double Kick
Moves.Description: A double-kicking attack that strikes the foe twice.

Moves.Name: Mega Kick
Moves.Description: An extremely powerful kick with intense force.

Moves.Name: Jump Kick
Moves.Description: A strong jumping kick. May miss and hurt the kicker.

Moves.Name: Rolling Kick
Moves.Description: A fast kick delivered from a rapid spin.

Moves.Name: Sand-Attack
Moves.Description: Reduces the foe's accuracy by hurling sand in its face.

Moves.Name: Headbutt
Moves.Description: A ramming attack that may cause flinching.

Moves.Name: Horn Attack
Moves.Description: Jabs the foe with sharp horns.

Moves.Name: Fury Attack
Moves.Description: Jabs the foe 2 to 5 times with sharp horns, etc.

Moves.Name: Horn Drill
Moves.Description: A one-hit KO attack that uses a horn like a drill.

Moves.Name: Tackle
Moves.Description: Charges the foe with a full-body tackle.

Moves.Name: Body Slam
Moves.Description: A full-body slam that may cause paralysis.

Moves.Name: Wrap
Moves.Description: Wraps and squeezes the foe 2 to 5 times with vines, etc.

Moves.Name: Take Down
Moves.Description: A reckless charge attack that also hurts the user.

Moves.Name: Thrash
Moves.Description: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.

Moves.Name: Double-Edge
Moves.Description: A life-risking tackle that also hurts the user.

Moves.Name: Tail Whip
Moves.Description: Wags the tail to lower the foe's Defense.

Moves.Name: Poison Sting
Moves.Description: A toxic attack with barbs, etc., that may poison.

Moves.Name: Twineedle
Moves.Description: Stingers on the forelegs jab the foe twice.

Moves.Name: Pin Missile
Moves.Description: Sharp pins are fired to strike 2 to 5 times.

Moves.Name: Leer
Moves.Description: Frightens the foe with a leer to lower Defense.

Moves.Name: Bite
Moves.Description: Bites with vicious fangs. May cause flinching.

Moves.Name: Growl
Moves.Description: Growls cutely to reduce the foe's Attack.

Moves.Name: Roar
Moves.Description: Makes the foe flee to end the battle.

Moves.Name: Sing
Moves.Description: A soothing song lulls the foe into a deep slumber.

Moves.Name: Supersonic
Moves.Description: Emits bizarre sound waves that may confuse the foe.

Moves.Name: Sonic Boom
Moves.Description: Launches shock waves that always inflict 20 HP damage.

Moves.Name: Disable
Moves.Description: Psychically disables one of the foe's moves.

Moves.Name: Acid
Moves.Description: Sprays a hide-melting acid. May lower Defense.

Moves.Name: Ember
Moves.Description: A weak fire attack that may inflict a burn.

Moves.Name: Flamethrower
Moves.Description: A powerful fire attack that may inflict a burn.

Moves.Name: Mist
Moves.Description: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.

Moves.Name: Water Gun
Moves.Description: Squirts water to attack the foe.

Moves.Name: Hydro Pump
Moves.Description: Blasts water at high power to strike the foe.

Moves.Name: Surf
Moves.Description: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.

Moves.Name: Ice Beam
Moves.Description: Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may freeze it.

Moves.Name: Blizzard
Moves.Description: Hits the foe with an icy storm that may freeze it.

Moves.Name: Psybeam
Moves.Description: Fires a peculiar ray that may confuse the foe.

Moves.Name: BubbleBeam
Moves.Description: Forcefully sprays bubbles that may lower Speed.

Moves.Name: Aurora Beam
Moves.Description: Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower Attack.

Moves.Name: Hyper Beam
Moves.Description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

Moves.Name: Peck
Moves.Description: Attacks the foe with a jabbing beak, etc.

Moves.Name: Drill Peck
Moves.Description: A corkscrewing attack with the beak acting as a drill.

Moves.Name: Submission
Moves.Description: A reckless body slam that also hurts the user.

Moves.Name: Low Kick
Moves.Description: A kick that inflicts more damage on heavier foes.

Moves.Name: Counter
Moves.Description: Retaliates any physical hit with double the power.

Moves.Name: Seismic Toss
Moves.Description: Inflicts damage identical to the user's level.

Moves.Name: Strength
Moves.Description: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.

Moves.Name: Absorb
Moves.Description: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.

Moves.Name: Mega Drain
Moves.Description: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.

Moves.Name: Leech Seed
Moves.Description: Plants a seed on the foe to steal HP on every turn.

Moves.Name: Growth
Moves.Description: Forces the body to grow and heightens Sp. Atk.

Moves.Name: Razor Leaf
Moves.Description: Cuts the enemy with leaves. High critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: SolarBeam
Moves.Description: Absorbs light in one turn, then attacks next turn.

Moves.Name: PoisonPowder
Moves.Description: Scatters a toxic powder that may poison the foe.

Moves.Name: Stun Spore
Moves.Description: Scatters a powder that may paralyze the foe.

Moves.Name: Sleep Powder
Moves.Description: Scatters a powder that may cause the foe to sleep.

Moves.Name: Petal Dance
Moves.Description: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.

Moves.Name: String Shot
Moves.Description: Binds the foe with string to reduce its Speed.

Moves.Name: Dragon Rage
Moves.Description: Launches shock waves that always inflict 40 HP damage.

Moves.Name: Fire Spin
Moves.Description: Traps the foe in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.

Moves.Name: ThunderShock
Moves.Description: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

Moves.Name: Thunderbolt
Moves.Description: A strong electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

Moves.Name: Thunder Wave
Moves.Description: A weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the foe.

Moves.Name: Thunder
Moves.Description: A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.

Moves.Name: Rock Throw
Moves.Description: Throws small rocks to strike the foe.

Moves.Name: Earthquake
Moves.Description: A powerful quake, but has no effect on flying foes.

Moves.Name: Fissure
Moves.Description: A one-hit KO move that drops the foe in a fissure.

Moves.Name: Dig
Moves.Description: Digs underground the first turn and strikes next turn.

Moves.Name: Toxic
Moves.Description: Poisons the foe with an intensifying toxin.

Moves.Name: Confusion
Moves.Description: A psychic attack that may cause confusion.

Moves.Name: Psychic
Moves.Description: A powerful psychic attack that may lower Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: Hypnosis
Moves.Description: A hypnotizing move that may induce sleep.

Moves.Name: Meditate
Moves.Description: Meditates in a peaceful fashion to raise Attack.

Moves.Name: Agility
Moves.Description: Relaxes the body to sharply boost Speed.

Moves.Name: Quick Attack
Moves.Description: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.

Moves.Name: Rage
Moves.Description: Raises the user's Attack every time it is hit.

Moves.Name: Teleport
Moves.Description: A psychic move for fleeing from battle instantly.

Moves.Name: Night Shade
Moves.Description: Inflicts damage identical to the user's level.

Moves.Name: Mimic
Moves.Description: Copies a move used by the foe during one battle.

Moves.Name: Screech
Moves.Description: Emits a screech to sharply reduce the foe's Defense.

Moves.Name: Double Team
Moves.Description: Creates illusory copies to raise evasiveness.

Moves.Name: Recover
Moves.Description: Recovers up to half the user's maximum HP.

Moves.Name: Harden
Moves.Description: Stiffens the body's muscles to raise Defense.

Moves.Name: Minimize
Moves.Description: Minimizes the user's size to raise evasiveness.

Moves.Name: SmokeScreen
Moves.Description: Lowers the foe's accuracy using smoke, ink, etc.

Moves.Name: Confuse Ray
Moves.Description: A sinister ray that confuses the foe.

Moves.Name: Withdraw
Moves.Description: Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise Defense.

Moves.Name: Defense Curl
Moves.Description: Curls up to conceal weak spots and raise Defense.

Moves.Name: Barrier
Moves.Description: Creates a barrier that sharply raises Defense.

Moves.Name: Light Screen
Moves.Description: Creates a wall of light that lowers Sp. Atk damage.

Moves.Name: Haze
Moves.Description: Creates a black haze that eliminates all stat changes.

Moves.Name: Reflect
Moves.Description: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.

Moves.Name: Focus Energy
Moves.Description: Focuses power to raise the critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Bide
Moves.Description: Endures attack for 2 turns to retaliate double.

Moves.Name: Metronome
Moves.Description: Waggles a finger to use any Pok√©mon move at random.

Moves.Name: Mirror Move
Moves.Description: Counters the foe's attack with the same move.

Moves.Name: Selfdestruct
Moves.Description: Inflicts severe damage but makes the user faint.

Moves.Name: Egg Bomb
Moves.Description: An egg is forcibly hurled at the foe.

Moves.Name: Lick
Moves.Description: Licks with a long tongue to injure. May also paralyze.

Moves.Name: Smog
Moves.Description: An exhaust-gas attack that may also poison.

Moves.Name: Sludge
Moves.Description: Sludge is hurled to inflict damage. May also poison.

Moves.Name: Bone Club
Moves.Description: Clubs the foe with a bone. May cause flinching.

Moves.Name: Fire Blast
Moves.Description: Incinerates everything it strikes. May cause a burn.

Moves.Name: Waterfall
Moves.Description: Attacks the foe with enough power to climb waterfalls.

Moves.Name: Clamp
Moves.Description: Traps and squeezes the foe for 2 to 5 turns.

Moves.Name: Swift
Moves.Description: Sprays star-shaped rays that never miss.

Moves.Name: Skull Bash
Moves.Description: Tucks in the head, then attacks on the next turn.

Moves.Name: Spike Cannon
Moves.Description: Launches sharp spikes that strike 2 to 5 times.

Moves.Name: Constrict
Moves.Description: Constricts to inflict pain. May lower Speed.

Moves.Name: Amnesia
Moves.Description: Forgets about something and sharply raises Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: Kinesis
Moves.Description: Distracts the foe. May lower accuracy.

Moves.Name: Soft-Boiled
Moves.Description: Recovers up to half the user's maximum HP.

Moves.Name: Hi Jump Kick
Moves.Description: A jumping knee kick. If it misses, the user is hurt.

Moves.Name: Glare
Moves.Description: Intimidates and frightens the foe into paralysis.

Moves.Name: Dream Eater
Moves.Description: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping foe.

Moves.Name: Poison Gas
Moves.Description: Envelops the foe in a toxic gas that may poison.

Moves.Name: Barrage
Moves.Description: Hurls round objects at the foe 2 to 5 times.

Moves.Name: Leech Life
Moves.Description: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.

Moves.Name: Lovely Kiss
Moves.Description: Demands a kiss with a scary face that induces sleep.

Moves.Name: Sky Attack
Moves.Description: Searches out weak spots, then strikes the next turn.

Moves.Name: Transform
Moves.Description: Alters the user's cells to become a copy of the foe.

Moves.Name: Bubble
Moves.Description: An attack using bubbles. May lower the foe's Speed.

Moves.Name: Dizzy Punch
Moves.Description: A rhythmic punch that may confuse the foe.

Moves.Name: Spore
Moves.Description: Scatters a cloud of spores that always induce sleep.

Moves.Name: Flash
Moves.Description: Looses a powerful blast of light that cuts accuracy.

Moves.Name: Psywave
Moves.Description: Attacks with a psychic wave of varying intensity.

Moves.Name: Splash
Moves.Description: It's just a splash... Has no effect whatsoever.

Moves.Name: Acid Armor
Moves.Description: Liquifies the user's body to sharply raise Defense.

Moves.Name: Crabhammer
Moves.Description: Hammers with a pincer. Has a high critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Explosion
Moves.Description: Inflicts severe damage but makes the user faint.

Moves.Name: Fury Swipes
Moves.Description: Rakes the foe with sharp claws, etc., 2 to 5 times.

Moves.Name: Bonemerang
Moves.Description: Throws a bone boomerang that strikes twice.

Moves.Name: Rest
Moves.Description: The user sleeps for 2 turns, restoring HP and status.

Moves.Name: Rock Slide
Moves.Description: Large boulders are hurled. May cause flinching.

Moves.Name: Hyper Fang
Moves.Description: Attacks with sharp fangs. May cause flinching.

Moves.Name: Sharpen
Moves.Description: Reduces the polygon count and raises Attack.

Moves.Name: Conversion
Moves.Description: Changes the user's type into a known move's type.

Moves.Name: Tri Attack
Moves.Description: Fires three types of beams at the same time.

Moves.Name: Super Fang
Moves.Description: Attacks with sharp fangs and cuts half the foe's HP.

Moves.Name: Slash
Moves.Description: Slashes with claws, etc. Has a high critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Substitute
Moves.Description: Creates a decoy using 1/4 of the user's maximum HP.

Moves.Name: Struggle
Moves.Description: Used only if all PP are gone. Also hurts the user a little.

Moves.Name: Sketch
Moves.Description: Copies the foe's last move permanently.

Moves.Name: Triple Kick
Moves.Description: Kicks the foe 3 times in a row with rising intensity.

Moves.Name: Thief
Moves.Description: While attacking, it may steal the foe's held item.

Moves.Name: Spider Web
Moves.Description: Ensnares the foe to stop it from fleeing or switching.

Moves.Name: Mind Reader
Moves.Description: Senses the foe's action to ensure the next move's hit.

Moves.Name: Nightmare
Moves.Description: Inflicts 1/4 damage on a sleeping foe every turn.

Moves.Name: Flame Wheel
Moves.Description: A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.

Moves.Name: Snore
Moves.Description: A loud attack that can be used only while asleep.

Moves.Name: Curse
Moves.Description: A move that functions differently for Ghosts.

Moves.Name: Flail
Moves.Description: Inflicts more damage when the user's HP is down.

Moves.Name: Conversion 2
Moves.Description: Makes the user resistant to the last attack's type.

Moves.Name: Aeroblast
Moves.Description: Launches a vacuumed blast. High critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Cotton Spore
Moves.Description: Spores cling to the foe, sharply reducing Speed.

Moves.Name: Reversal
Moves.Description: Inflicts more damage when the user's HP is down.

Moves.Name: Spite
Moves.Description: Spitefully cuts the PP of the foe's last move.

Moves.Name: Powder Snow
Moves.Description: Blasts the foe with a snowy gust. May cause freezing.

Moves.Name: Protect
Moves.Description: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.

Moves.Name: Mach Punch
Moves.Description: A punch is thrown at wicked speed to strike first.

Moves.Name: Scary Face
Moves.Description: Frightens with a scary face to sharply reduce Speed.

Moves.Name: Faint Attack
Moves.Description: Draws the foe close, then strikes without fail.

Moves.Name: Sweet Kiss
Moves.Description: Demands a kiss with a cute look. May cause confusion.

Moves.Name: Belly Drum
Moves.Description: Maximizes Attack while sacrificing HP.

Moves.Name: Sludge Bomb
Moves.Description: Sludge is hurled to inflict damage. May also poison.

Moves.Name: Mud-Slap
Moves.Description: Hurls mud in the foe's face to reduce its accuracy.

Moves.Name: Octazooka
Moves.Description: Fires a lump of ink to damage and cut accuracy.

Moves.Name: Spikes
Moves.Description: Sets spikes that hurt a foe switching in.

Moves.Name: Zap Cannon
Moves.Description: Powerful and sure to cause paralysis, but inaccurate.

Moves.Name: Foresight
Moves.Description: Negates the foe's efforts to heighten evasiveness.

Moves.Name: Destiny Bond
Moves.Description: If the user faints, the foe is also made to faint.

Moves.Name: Perish Song
Moves.Description: Any Pok√©mon hearing this song faints in 3 turns.

Moves.Name: Icy Wind
Moves.Description: A chilling attack that lowers the foe's Speed.

Moves.Name: Detect
Moves.Description: Evades attack, but may fail if used in succession.

Moves.Name: Bone Rush
Moves.Description: Strikes the foe with a bone in hand 2 to 5 times.

Moves.Name: Lock-On
Moves.Description: Locks on to the foe to ensure the next move hits.

Moves.Name: Outrage
Moves.Description: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.

Moves.Name: Sandstorm
Moves.Description: Causes a sandstorm that rages for several turns.

Moves.Name: Giga Drain
Moves.Description: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.

Moves.Name: Endure
Moves.Description: Endures any attack for 1 turn, leaving at least 1 HP.

Moves.Name: Charm
Moves.Description: Charms the foe and sharply reduces its Attack.

Moves.Name: Rollout
Moves.Description: An attack lasting 5 turns with rising intensity.

Moves.Name: False Swipe
Moves.Description: An attack that leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.

Moves.Name: Swagger
Moves.Description: Confuses the foe, but also sharply raises Attack.

Moves.Name: Milk Drink
Moves.Description: Recovers up to half the user's maximum HP.

Moves.Name: Spark
Moves.Description: An electrified tackle that may paralyze the foe.

Moves.Name: Fury Cutter
Moves.Description: An attack that intensifies on each successive hit.

Moves.Name: Steel Wing
Moves.Description: Strikes the foe with hard wings spread wide.

Moves.Name: Mean Look
Moves.Description: Fixes the foe with a mean look that prevents escape.

Moves.Name: Attract
Moves.Description: Makes the opposite gender less likely to attack.

Moves.Name: Sleep Talk
Moves.Description: Uses an available move randomly while asleep.

Moves.Name: Heal Bell
Moves.Description: Chimes soothingly to heal all status abnormalities.

Moves.Name: Return
Moves.Description: An attack that increases in power with friendship.

Moves.Name: Present
Moves.Description: A gift in the form of a bomb. May restore HP.

Moves.Name: Frustration
Moves.Description: An attack that is stronger if the Trainer is disliked.

Moves.Name: Safeguard
Moves.Description: A mystical force prevents all status problems.

Moves.Name: Pain Split
Moves.Description: Adds the user and foe's HP, then shares them equally.

Moves.Name: Sacred Fire
Moves.Description: A mystical fire attack that may inflict a burn.

Moves.Name: Magnitude
Moves.Description: A ground-shaking attack of random intensity.

Moves.Name: DynamicPunch
Moves.Description: Powerful and sure to cause confusion, but inaccurate.

Moves.Name: Megahorn
Moves.Description: A brutal ramming attack using out-thrust horns.

Moves.Name: DragonBreath
Moves.Description: Strikes the foe with an incredible blast of breath.

Moves.Name: Baton Pass
Moves.Description: Switches out the user while keeping effects in play.

Moves.Name: Encore
Moves.Description: Makes the foe repeat its last move over 2 to 6 turns.

Moves.Name: Pursuit
Moves.Description: Inflicts bad damage if used on a foe switching out.

Moves.Name: Rapid Spin
Moves.Description: Spins the body at high speed to strike the foe.

Moves.Name: Sweet Scent
Moves.Description: Allures the foe to reduce evasiveness.

Moves.Name: Iron Tail
Moves.Description: Slams the foe with a hard tail. It may also lower Defense.

Moves.Name: Metal Claw
Moves.Description: A claw attack that may raise the user's Attack.

Moves.Name: Vital Throw
Moves.Description: Makes the user's move last, but it never misses.

Moves.Name: Morning Sun
Moves.Description: Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.

Moves.Name: Synthesis
Moves.Description: Restores HP. The amount varies with the weather.

Moves.Name: Moonlight
Moves.Description: Restores HP. The amount restored with the weather.

Moves.Name: Hidden Power
Moves.Description: The effectiveness varies with the user.

Moves.Name: Cross Chop
Moves.Description: A double-chopping attack. High critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Twister
Moves.Description: Whips up a vicious twister to tear at the foe.

Moves.Name: Rain Dance
Moves.Description: Boosts the power of Water-type moves for 5 turns.

Moves.Name: Sunny Day
Moves.Description: Boosts the power of Fire-type moves for 5 turns.

Moves.Name: Crunch
Moves.Description: Crunches with sharp fangs. May lower Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: Mirror Coat
Moves.Description: Counters the foe's special attack at double the power.

Moves.Name: Psych Up
Moves.Description: Copies the foe's effect(s) and gives to the user.

Moves.Name: ExtremeSpeed
Moves.Description: An extremely fast and powerful attack.

Moves.Name: AncientPower
Moves.Description: An attack that may raise all stats.

Moves.Name: Shadow Ball
Moves.Description: Hurls a black blob that may lower Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: Future Sight
Moves.Description: Heightens inner power to strike 2 turns later.

Moves.Name: Rock Smash
Moves.Description: A rock-crushing attack that may lower Defense.

Moves.Name: Whirlpool
Moves.Description: Traps and hurts the foe in a whirlpool for 2 to 5 turns.

Moves.Name: Beat Up
Moves.Description: Summons party Pok√©mon to join in the attack.

Moves.Name: Fake Out
Moves.Description: A 1st-turn, 1st-strike move that causes flinching.

Moves.Name: Uproar
Moves.Description: Causes an uproar for 2 to 5 turns and prevents sleep.

Moves.Name: Stockpile
Moves.Description: Charges up power for up to 3 turns.

Moves.Name: Spit Up
Moves.Description: Releases stockpiled power (the more the better).

Moves.Name: Swallow
Moves.Description: Absorbs stockpiled power and restores HP.

Moves.Name: Heat Wave
Moves.Description: Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.

Moves.Name: Hail
Moves.Description: Summons a hailstorm that strikes every turn.

Moves.Name: Torment
Moves.Description: Torments the foe and stops successive use of a move.

Moves.Name: Flatter
Moves.Description: Confuses the foe, but raises its Sp. Atk.

Moves.Name: Will-O-Wisp
Moves.Description: Inflicts a burn on the foe with intense fire.

Moves.Name: Memento
Moves.Description: The user faints and lowers the foe's abilities.

Moves.Name: Facade
Moves.Description: Boosts Attack when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

Moves.Name: Focus Punch
Moves.Description: A powerful loyalty attack. The user flinches if hit.

Moves.Name: SmellingSalt
Moves.Description: Powerful against paralyzed foes, but also heals them.

Moves.Name: Follow Me
Moves.Description: Draws attention to make foes attack only the user.

Moves.Name: Nature Power
Moves.Description: The type of attack varies depending on the location.

Moves.Name: Charge
Moves.Description: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.

Moves.Name: Taunt
Moves.Description: Taunts the foe into only using attack moves.

Moves.Name: Helping Hand
Moves.Description: Boosts the power of the recipient's moves.

Moves.Name: Trick
Moves.Description: Tricks the foe into trading held items.

Moves.Name: Role Play
Moves.Description: Mimics the target and copies its special ability.

Moves.Name: Wish
Moves.Description: A wish that restores HP. It takes time to work.

Moves.Name: Assist
Moves.Description: Attacks randomly with one of the partner's moves.

Moves.Name: Ingrain
Moves.Description: Lays roots that restore HP. The user can't switch out.

Moves.Name: Superpower
Moves.Description: Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities.

Moves.Name: Magic Coat
Moves.Description: Reflects special effects back to the attacker.

Moves.Name: Recycle
Moves.Description: Recycles a used item for one more use.

Moves.Name: Revenge
Moves.Description: An attack that gains power if injured by the foe.

Moves.Name: Brick Break
Moves.Description: Destroys barriers such as Reflect and causes damage.

Moves.Name: Yawn
Moves.Description: Lulls the foe into yawning, then sleeping the next turn.

Moves.Name: Knock Off
Moves.Description: Knocks down the foe's held item to prevent its use.

Moves.Name: Endeavor
Moves.Description: Gains power if the user's HP is lower than the foe's HP.

Moves.Name: Eruption
Moves.Description: The higher the user's HP, the more damage caused.

Moves.Name: Skill Swap
Moves.Description: The user swaps special abilities with the target.

Moves.Name: Imprison
Moves.Description: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.

Moves.Name: Refresh
Moves.Description: Heals poisoning, paralysis, or a burn.

Moves.Name: Grudge
Moves.Description: If the user faints, deletes all PP of foe's last move.

Moves.Name: Snatch
Moves.Description: Steals the effects of the move the target uses next.

Moves.Name: Secret Power
Moves.Description: An attack with effects that vary by location.

Moves.Name: Dive
Moves.Description: Dives underwater the first turn and strikes next turn.

Moves.Name: Arm Thrust
Moves.Description: Straight-arm punches that strike the foe 2 to 5 times.

Moves.Name: Camouflage
Moves.Description: Alters the Pok√©mon's type depending on the location.

Moves.Name: Tail Glow
Moves.Description: Flashes a light that sharply raises Sp. Atk.

Moves.Name: Luster Purge
Moves.Description: Attacks with a burst of light. May lower Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: Mist Ball
Moves.Description: Attacks with a flurry of down. May lower Sp. Atk.

Moves.Name: FeatherDance
Moves.Description: Envelops the foe with down to sharply reduce Attack.

Moves.Name: Teeter Dance
Moves.Description: Confuses all Pok√©mon on the scene.

Moves.Name: Blaze Kick
Moves.Description: A kick with a high critical-hit ratio. May cause a burn.

Moves.Name: Mud Sport
Moves.Description: Covers the user in mud to raise electrical resistance.

Moves.Name: Ice Ball
Moves.Description: A 5-turn attack that gains power on successive hits.

Moves.Name: Needle Arm
Moves.Description: Attacks with thorny arms. May cause flinching.

Moves.Name: Slack Off
Moves.Description: Slacks off and restores half the maximum HP.

Moves.Name: Hyper Voice
Moves.Description: A loud attack that uses sound waves to injure.

Moves.Name: Poison Fang
Moves.Description: A sharp-fanged attack. May badly poison the foe.

Moves.Name: Crush Claw
Moves.Description: Tears at the foe with sharp claws. May lower Defense.

Moves.Name: Blast Burn
Moves.Description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

Moves.Name: Hydro Cannon
Moves.Description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

Moves.Name: Meteor Mash
Moves.Description: Fires a meteor-like punch. May raise Attack.

Moves.Name: Astonish
Moves.Description: An attack that may shock the foe into flinching.

Moves.Name: Weather Ball
Moves.Description: The move's type and power change with the weather.

Moves.Name: Aromatherapy
Moves.Description: Heals all status problems with a soothing scent.

Moves.Name: Fake Tears
Moves.Description: Feigns crying to sharply lower the foe's Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: Air Cutter
Moves.Description: Hacks with razorlike wind. High critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Overheat
Moves.Description: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers Sp. Atk.

Moves.Name: Odor Sleuth
Moves.Description: Negates the foe's efforts to heighten evasiveness.

Moves.Name: Rock Tomb
Moves.Description: Stops the foe from moving with rocks and cuts Speed.

Moves.Name: Silver Wind
Moves.Description: A powdery attack that may raise abilities.

Moves.Name: Metal Sound
Moves.Description: Emits a horrible screech that sharply lowers Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: GrassWhistle
Moves.Description: Lulls the foe into sleep with a pleasant melody.

Moves.Name: Tickle
Moves.Description: Makes the foe laugh to lower Attack and Defense.

Moves.Name: Cosmic Power
Moves.Description: Raises Defense and Sp. Def with a mystic power.

Moves.Name: Water Spout
Moves.Description: Inflicts more damage if the user's HP is high.

Moves.Name: Signal Beam
Moves.Description: A strange beam attack that may confuse the foe.

Moves.Name: Shadow Punch
Moves.Description: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

Moves.Name: Extrasensory
Moves.Description: Attacks with a peculiar power. May cause flinching.

Moves.Name: Sky Uppercut
Moves.Description: An uppercut thrown as if leaping into the sky.

Moves.Name: Sand Tomb
Moves.Description: Traps and hurts the foe in quicksand for 2 to 5 turns.

Moves.Name: Sheer Cold
Moves.Description: A chilling attack that causes fainting if it hits.

Moves.Name: Muddy Water
Moves.Description: Attacks with muddy water. May lower accuracy.

Moves.Name: Bullet Seed
Moves.Description: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.

Moves.Name: Aerial Ace
Moves.Description: An extremely speedy and unavoidable attack.

Moves.Name: Icicle Spear
Moves.Description: Attacks the foe by firing 2 to 5 icicles in a row.

Moves.Name: Iron Defense
Moves.Description: Hardens the body's surface to sharply raise Defense.

Moves.Name: Block
Moves.Description: Blocks the foe's way to prevent escape.

Moves.Name: Howl
Moves.Description: Howls to raise the spirit and boosts Attack.

Moves.Name: Dragon Claw
Moves.Description: Slashes the foe with sharp claws.

Moves.Name: Frenzy Plant
Moves.Description: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.

Moves.Name: Bulk Up
Moves.Description: Bulks up the body to boost both Attack and Defense.

Moves.Name: Bounce
Moves.Description: Bounces up, then down the next turn. May paralyze.

Moves.Name: Mud Shot
Moves.Description: Hurls mud at the foe and reduces Speed.

Moves.Name: Poison Tail
Moves.Description: Has a high critical-hit ratio. May also poison.

Moves.Name: Covet
Moves.Description: Cutely begs to obtain an item held by the foe.

Moves.Name: Volt Tackle
Moves.Description: A life-risking tackle that slightly hurts the user.

Moves.Name: Magical Leaf
Moves.Description: Attacks with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.

Moves.Name: Water Sport
Moves.Description: The user becomes soaked to raise resistance to fire.

Moves.Name: Calm Mind
Moves.Description: Raises Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by focusing the mind.

Moves.Name: Leaf Blade
Moves.Description: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Dragon Dance
Moves.Description: A mystical dance that ups Attack and Speed.

Moves.Name: Rock Blast
Moves.Description: Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row.

Moves.Name: Shock Wave
Moves.Description: A fast and unavoidable electric attack.

Moves.Name: Water Pulse
Moves.Description: Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe.

Moves.Name: Doom Desire
Moves.Description: Summons strong sunlight to attack 2 turns later.

Moves.Name: Psycho Boost
Moves.Description: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers Sp. Atk.

Moves.Name: ConfusionX
Moves.Description: MISSINGNO
